name: Book of Demons
description: Installer for the GOG version with dxvk enabled.
notes: Disable VSync in game to fix sluggish mouse cursor.
content:
script:
  files:
  - installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
  game:
    arch: win64
    exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/GOG Games/Book of Demons/r2g_launcher.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  installer:
  - task:
      arch: win64
      description: Creating Wine prefix
      name: create_prefix
      prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  - task:
      arch: win64
      args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI
      executable: installer
      name: wineexec
      prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  system:
    env:
      DXVK_HUD: 0
  wine:
    dxvk: true
